title: Pro Carry SCCY 9mm Leather Gun Holster LT Left Hand IWB Black
description: ***LEFT HAND INSIDE THE WAISTBAND*** THIS IS ONE OF THE FINEST INSIDE THE PANTS, CLIP ON, SUPER LIGHT WEIGHT HOLSTERS AVAILABLE TODAY. The Pro Carry LT is a entry level gun holster. This specific model is made for those who seldom carry and want something that is comfortable and functional. Our Pro Carry LT is specifically sewn to your exact gun for a perfect fit. The LT is a great alternative to nylon and highly recommended. The Pro Carry LT utilizes the same American made metal belt clip we use on our HD holsters. Since we use metal clips our holster stays put once the weapon is drawn. **The Picture is a STOCK PHOTO, ALL HOLSTERS ARE MADE FOR EACH INDICATED WEAPON**
